1: <pb/><t>A slolonel vin̈aj rey Lemuel, aton b'aj ix c'ayb'aj vin̈ yuj ix snun. Ix yalan vin̈ icha tic: A ix in nun alannac d'ayin icha tic:</t>
2: <t>Ach vune', a Dios ix ach ac'an d'ayin yuj spacoc tas ix in c'an d'ay, ¿tas val junocxo vach' ol val d'ayach?</t>
3: <t>Man̈ a juel a b'a yuj eb' ix ix, yujto yuj eb' ix ix chi', man̈ jantacoc eb' rey sjuvieli.</t>
4: <t>Ach Lemuel, man̈ vach'oc tato syuc' an̈ an̈ eb' yajal,</t>
5: <t>yujto yuj an̈ an̈ chi' sb'at satc'olal ley yuj eb', axo yixtan eb' anima emnaquil eb'.</t>
6: <t>Yuc'ocab' an̈ eb' ayoch d'a syaelal. Yuc'ocab' an̈ an̈ te ov, eb' te ayoch d'a ilc'olal.</t>
7: <t>Yuc'ocab' an̈ eb' yic vach' maxtzac snacot smeb'ail eb' yed' syaelal chi'.</t>
8: <t>Al yuj eb' max ujilaj yalan sb'a d'a eb' yajal. Col eb' malaj junoc mach scolani.</t>
9: <t>Ac' ip a b'oan yaj eb' d'a stojolal, col eb' te ilb'ajc'ool yed' eb' emnaquil, xchi ix in nun chi' d'ayin, xchi vin̈aj Lemuel chi'.</t>
10: <t>A junoc ix ix te ay spensar, man̈ comonoc tz'ilchaj ix, yujto ec'to yelc'och ix d'a yichan̈ q'uen q'ueen caro stojol.</t>
11: <t>A ix ayoch yipoc sc'ool vin̈ yetb'eyum, malaj junoc tas syac' palta d'a vin̈.</t>
12: <t>Tzalajc'olal yaj vin̈ yetb'eyum ix chi' yuuj d'a masanil tiempo.</t>
13: <t>Sb'at ix manoj lana yed' lino, yed' smasanil sc'ool ix smunlaj yed' juntzan̈ chi'.</t>
14: <t>Icha junoc te' barco sb'at d'a najat yic'cot tastac, icha chi' yaj ix, sb'at ix yic'cot tastac tz'och yuuj.</t>
15: <t>Ayto sc'ana' sq'ue vaan ix, tz'och ijan ix yac'an va vin̈ yetb'eyum yed' eb' yune' yed' pax eb' ix smajan.</t>
16: <t>Sb'at ix yil junoc luum yic smanan ix, axo q'uen tumin syac' ganar ix, a q'uen syac'lab'ej ix yavan te' uva d'a sat jun luum chi'.</t>
18: <t>Scham val yilan ix tas tz'aj sb'ey schon̈. C'ual d'ac'val smunlaj ix.</t>
19: <t>Yed' sc'ab' ix sb'o sch'al yic sch'alvi.</t>
20: <t>Naann̈ej eb' meb'a' yed' eb' ayoch d'a ilc'olal yuj ix.</t>
21: <t>Max yac'laj pensar ix yuj masanil eb' ay d'a yol spat ayic te ay siic, yujto masanil eb', te vach' spichul eb' ayochi.</t>
22: <t>A ix sb'oan sc'u' vach'. A c'apac c'apac vach' syac'och ix spichuloc.</t>
23: <t>A vin̈ yetb'eyum ix chi', ojtacab'il vin̈ d'a scal eb' vin̈ nivac vinac d'a yol schon̈ab', ayoch vin̈ stz'acub'oc eb' nivac vinac yaj d'a yol schon̈ab' chi'.</t>
24: <t>Sb'o pichul ix, sb'o pax tzec'ul ix, schon̈an ix d'a eb' chon̈um c'apac.</t>
25: <t>Te tec'an spensar ix, te ay yelc'och ix d'a yol sat eb' yetanimail. Max yac'laj pensar ix yuj tas tz'och yuj q'uic'an.</t>
26: <t>D'a val jelanil slolon ix, yed' smasanil sc'ol ix syac' c'ayb'ub'al.</t>
27: <t>Ayn̈ejoch ix yilani tas tz'aj sb'ey masanil tastac ay d'a spat, man̈ ton̈ejoc sb'alec' tiempo ix.</t>
28: <t>A eb' yune' ix yed' vin̈ yetb'eyum, syal vach' lolonel eb' d'a ix, syalan eb' icha tic:</t>
29: <t>Man̈ jantacoc eb' ix ix vach' sb'eyb'al, palta a achn̈ej te vach' a b'eyb'al d'a yichan̈ eb' ix smasanil, xchi eb' d'a ix.</t>
30: <t>A svach'il yilji snivanil junoc ix ix, ay b'aj ton̈ej tzon̈ smontej. Man̈ jantacoc svach'il yilji sat ix, palta junn̈ej rato sq'uexmaj yilji, axo ix ix ay yelc'och Jehová d'a yol sat, smojton val nivan yelc'och ix.</t>
31: <t>Alec vach' lolonel yuj ix d'a yichan̈ masanil chon̈ab'. Aljocab' ix vach'il yuj masanil tastac sc'ulej.</t>
